text: @ Consider Siding window algorithm with sender and receiver window size equal to 3. B Let the timeout interval for retransmission of lost packet is2 x RTT. Assume packets with sequence numbers 1 to 6 are being sent. If frames 3 and 6 are lost on their first transmission then after how many RT'T's from initial we will send packet 6 again? Assume fast retransmission is implemented such that retransmission takes place either upon receipt of the first duplicate ACK or upon timeout. A3 B.5 C.6 D.8
